point.label: Active Power Max Rating
point.description: Maximum active power rating at unity power factor in watts.

point.label: Active Power (Over-Excited) Rating
point.description: Active power rating at specified over-excited power factor in watts.

point.label: Specified Over-Excited PF
point.description: Specified over-excited power factor.

point.description: Active power rating at specified under-excited power factor in watts.

point.description: Specified under-excited power factor.

point.label: Apparent Power Max Rating
point.description: Maximum apparent power rating in voltamperes.

point.label: Reactive Power Injected Rating
point.description: Maximum injected reactive power rating in vars.

point.label: Reactive Power Absorbed Rating
point.description: Maximum absorbed reactive power rating in vars.

point.label: Charge Rate Max Rating
point.description: Maximum active power charge rate in watts.

point.label: Discharge Rate Max Rating
point.description: Maximum active power discharge rate in watts.

point.label: Charge Rate Max VA Rating
point.description: Maximum apparent power charge rate in voltamperes.

point.label: Discharge Rate Max VA Rating
point.description: Maximum apparent power discharge rate in voltamperes.

point.description: AC voltage maximum rating.

point.description: AC voltage minimum rating.

point.description: AC current maximum rating in amps.

point.description: Power factor over-excited rating.

point.label: PF Under-Excited Rating
point.description: Power factor under-excited rating.

point.label: Reactive Susceptance
point.description: Reactive susceptance that remains connected to the Area EPS in the cease to energize and trip state.

point.description: Normal operating performance category as specified in IEEE 1547-2018.

point.description: Abnormal operating performance category as specified in IEEE 1547-2018.

point.description: Supported control mode functions.
